products.title: Rusty Tinker
products.description: An well designed robot made from repurposed materials, giving it a rustic and Steampunk look.

details.description: The robot is primarily constructed from repurposed materials, including wood, metal, and various components. The body is made from a wooden box, with metal plates and gears attached for reinforcement and beauty appeal.
details.specifications: Material: Wood, Metal; Release Year: 2004; Style: Steampunk; Shape: Rectangular body with a rounded head/square head
details.careInstructions: Wipe with a dry cloth to clean.
